title: cho gath skin bug..
body:
so this bug is not game breaking but its annoying as heck  i play cho alot so i got most of his skins and i like the battle cast the most so the bug is 

the sounds from the normal skin is mixed with sounds of the battle cast one 

when using the E or R u hear the sound of both skins mixed 

the E with every basic attack 
and the R when eating something 
its annoying getting this skin was the best thing   i dont want to hear the old one with it :/

replies.body: Nice catch! We're take a look and see what's going on here - looks like the audio hooks may have been jumbled. :c
